title: America
description:
Oz, Vara Cooper and Britt Adams share stories about kinky online auctions, an old drug buddy, and a family's intolerance toward their son. Special thanks goes to Patreon member Britny Carr.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Stefon Harris & Blackout, Oz, Ceara, Vara Cooper, Casey Calvert, Britt Adams, John Legend, The Rolling Stones, Kevin Allison)
